project.context.localization.common.superclasses

Class LocalizationClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.context.localization.common.superclasses.CommonClass
      • project.context.localization.common.superclasses.LocalizationClass
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PhoneLocalizationClass

    public abstract class LocalizationClass
extends CommonClass
    The abstract class LocalizationClass offers methods and attributes to locate a user by two methods: WiFi-Fingerprinting and Bluetooth Beacons.

    • Field Detail

      • rangeNotifier

        public final org.altbeacon.beacon.RangeNotifier rangeNotifier
        The Range notifier gets called when beacon signals are found in the proximity of the device. The method basically stores the RSSI of the corresponding beacon. The RSSI information is later used in findClosestPlaceIdWithScanResults() to restrict the place list to the known ones in the beacon cell.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalizationClass

        Instantiates the LocalizationClass.

    • Method Detail

      • notifyLocationChange

        protected abstract void notifyLocationChange(java.lang.String priorPlaceId,
                                             java.lang.String foundPlaceId)
        Notify location change.
        Parameters:
        priorPlaceId - the prior place id
        foundPlaceId - the found place id

      • outputDetailedPlaceInfoDebug

        protected void outputDetailedPlaceInfoDebug(java.lang.String output)
        Output detailed debugging information debug.
        Parameters:
        output - the output showing the found place, its deviations of other APs and an confidence value for the found place

      • showLocalizationProgressOutput

        protected void showLocalizationProgressOutput()
        Show the progress output for the initial localization process.

      • startLocalization

        public void startLocalization()
        Triggers the continous localization of the user by scanning the WiFi and BLE Beacons. A Progress output is shown to the user to display the start of the localization process.

      • stopLocalization

        public void stopLocalization()
        Stop the continous localization and unregister the scanResultReceiver and hide the progress output.

      • updateLocalizationProgressUI

        protected void updateLocalizationProgressUI(java.lang.String foundPlaceId,
                                            java.lang.String locationDescription)
        Update localization progress ui.
        Parameters:
        foundPlaceId - the found place id
        locationDescription - the location description
